story.description: The story opens with Emperor Ming the Merciless (Max von Sydow) declaring that he will first play with, and then destroy, the Earth, using seemingly natural disasters which include earthquakes, hurricanes, volcanic euptions, tornados, and something called "hot hail".

sentences: Klytus, I'm bored.
What plaything can you offer me today?
An obscure body in the SK system. The inhabitants call it Earth.
How peaceful it looks.
How peaceful it looks.
EARTHQUAKE
EARTHQUAKE
Most effective, Your Majesty. Will you destroy this Earth?
Most effective, Your Majesty. Will you destroy this Earth?
Later. I like to play with things... before annihilation.
Later. I like to play with things... before annihilation.

story.description: Sometime later on Earth, New York Jets football star "Flash" Gordon (Sam J. Jones) boards a small plane. Onboard, he meets travel journalist Dale Arden (Melody Anderson). Mid-flight, the cockpit is hit by a meteorite sent by Ming and the pilots are sucked out. Flash takes control, and manages to crash land the craft in a greenhouse owned by Dr. Hans Zarkov (Topol). Zarkov, who believes the disasters are being caused by an unknown source in space which is sending the moon toward the Earth, has secretly constructed a rocket ship with which he intends to investigate. Zarkov's assistant refuses to help him, so he lures Flash and Dale inside the rocket. After a struggle, the rocket launches into orbit, taking the trio through a vordex to the planet Mongo. There, they are taken prisoner.

story.description: Flash, Dale and Zarkov are brought to the palace before Ming. Ming orders Dale to be prepared for his pleasure. Flash attempts to resist but is overpowered by Ming's bodyguards. Ming orders Zarkov to be reconditioned and Flash executed by leathal gas. Ming's daughter, Princess Aura (Ornella Muti), manipulates Ming's Chief Surgeon into helping her save Flash, to whom she is attracted, by having him injected with an imunity seurum helps him escape from the palace.

story.description: Zarkov is seemingly brainwashed by Klytus (Peter Wyngarde), the golden-masked de facto regent of Mongo and Ming's right hand man. Meanwhile, Aura and Flash flee in a shuttle to Arboria, the kingdom of Prince Barin (Timothy Dalton), Aura's lover. En route to Arboria, Aura reluctantly teaches Flash to use a telepathic communicator to contact Dale. He uses it let her know he is still alive. Dale informs Flash that she is locked in Ming's bedchamber. Encouraged by Flash, Dale escapes. Klytus dispatches Zarkov to intercept Dale, who informs Zarkov and a listening Klytus that Flash is alive. The two then escape, as Zarkov reveals he was able to resist the brainwashing process. But after fleeing the city, Dale and Zarkov are captured by Prince Vultan's (Brian Blessed) Hawkmen and taken to his kingdom, Sky City.

sentences: They're just conditioning him to our climate. Keep out of sight.

I visit it with mysteries, earthquakes, unpredicted eclipses.
Strange craters in the wilderness.
Strange craters in the wilderness.

I spare it. But if the hand of Ming is recognized in these events -
I spare it. But if the hand of Ming is recognized in these events -

Does anyone ever trust her twice?

Prince Vultan. Remember us?

story.description: Aura and Flash arrive at the forest moon Arboria. Aura asks Prince Barin to keep Flash safe. A distrustful Barin, who is in love with Aura, agrees not to kill Flash, but then contrives to force him to take part in a deadly ritual. Barin and Flash take turns sticking their hands into a hollow stump with a poisonous creature inside. When Barin compels Flash to take an extra turn, he pretends to be stung by the creature and begs for a quick death, using this as an opportunity to escape. Barin follows, but they are both captured by Prince Vultan's Hawkmen.

story.description: Meanwhile, Flash and Barin are captured by the Hawkmen and taken to Sky City, where Flash and Dale are briefly reunited. Flash is forced to fight Barin to the death, but Barin joins forces with Flash when he saves his life. Klytus arrives and threatens Vultan as well as everyone else for their insolence. Flash and Barin double-team up to overpower Klytus and kill him. Knowing that this will bring retribution on the Hawkmen, Vultan orders them to evacuate Sky City, leaving Barin, Flash, Dale and Zarkov behind. Ming's ship arrives shortly afterwards and he orders Barin, Zarkov and Dale to be taken aboard. Ming finds himself impressed with Flash, and offers him lordship over a subjugated Earth in exchange for fealty, as an alternative to death, which Flash refuses. Ming returns to his ship and gives the order to destroy Vultan's kingdom with Flash still on it. Flash cheats death by finding a rocket cycle in the city and escaping before Sky City is destroyed.

Flash Gordon to Vultan. Mayday, mayday.

story.description: Flash contacts Vultan, whose people have found refuge on Arboria, and they plot an attack on Mingo City. Flash pretends to attack Mingo City alone on his rocket cycle. General Kala dispatches the war rocket Ajax to bring back Flash's body, but the Hawkmen army intercepts and Flash and the Hawkmen seize control of the rocket after a fierce battle.

He's escaping, idiot! Dispatch War Rocket Ajax.
He's escaping, idiot! Dispatch War Rocket Ajax.
He's escaping, idiot! Dispatch War Rocket Ajax.
Charge the boosters.
Charge the boosters.
- Flash Gordon in range, Captain. - Fire!
- Flash Gordon in range, Captain. - Fire!
- Shall we go in after him? - No. Reduce velocity.
- Shall we go in after him? - No. Reduce velocity.
Our trap worked. They'll follow me for sure.
Stand by, my Hawkmen!
Stand by, my Hawkmen!
- He's not coming out, sir. - Prepare to electrify cloud.
Prepare sky nets to catch Gordon's body. Fire capacitators.
Prepare sky nets to catch Gordon's body. Fire capacitators.
Prepare sky nets to catch Gordon's body. Fire capacitators.
- They're trying to flush you out. - Let's go in.
- They're trying to flush you out. - Let's go in.
- They're trying to flush you out. - Let's go in.
Good. They're coming through.
Good. They're coming through.
Good. They're coming through.
Squadron 40... Dive!
Squadron 40... Dive!
Arm topside!
Arm topside!
Arm topside!
Second wave. Dive!
Second wave. Dive!
Stop engines. Repel boarders.
Stop engines. Repel boarders.
- Biro's hit. I'm going in after him. - Impetuous boy.
- Biro's hit. I'm going in after him. - Impetuous boy.
- Biro's hit. I'm going in after him. - Impetuous boy.
Oh well, who wants to live forever?
Dive!
Dive!
Biro, hold on, I'm coming.
Biro, hold on, I'm coming.
- You all right? - They winged me. Detonate the mine.
Blow it, Flash!
Blow it, Flash!
Blow it, Flash!
Let's get out of here.
Let's get out of here.
Let's get out of here.
Well done, Flash. Here. Up there, Luro!
Come on.
Come on.
Full velocity, all drives.
Full velocity, all drives.

story.description: In Mingo City, Princess Aura overpowers her guard and frees Barin and Zarkov from the execution chamber. Flash and the Hawkmen attack Mingo City in Ajax and Kala activates the city's defenses, as Ming and Dale's wedding starts. Mingo City's lightning field sheild protecting the city can only be penetrated in time to save Earth by flying Ajax in to it in a suicide run. Flash volunteers to stay at the helm to ensure it is successful and allow the Hawkmen to invade the city.

sentences: Pick that up, would you?
Pick that up, would you?
Tell me more about this Houdini.
Tell me more about this Houdini.
Tell me more about this Houdini.
This is it. At least it'll be over quickly.
This is it. At least it'll be over quickly.
This is it. At least it'll be over quickly.
Scanner malfunction, area 7-7 delta, under repair.
Scanner malfunction, area 7-7 delta, under repair.
Scanner malfunction, area 7-7 delta, under repair.
- They've changed the code. - I've changed too, Aura.
- I think I can work it out. - Will you marry me?
We'll try. Not now, Barin!
If I'm not at the wedding, I'll be shot.
I thought it was the Zeitman series! I haven't changed.
I thought it was the Zeitman series! I haven't changed.
Everybody take off! Form a battle stream behind the rocket.
Everybody take off! Form a battle stream behind the rocket.
Flash and me bail out when the shooting starts.
Flash and me bail out when the shooting starts.
- And keep your head down. - See you in Mingo City.
- And keep your head down. - See you in Mingo City.
Yes... with luck. What are you setting there?
That's the time left for the Earth. In minutes and seconds.
That's the time left for the Earth. In minutes and seconds.
- Level with me. Will this do it? - Yes, no doubt.
There's a lightning field at the entrance. When this baby hits it...
It will blow that field dead. My Hawkmen fly right in.
Let's see what Mingo City's saying.
Let's see what Mingo City's saying.
Oh, my God.
Oh, my God.
- Rocket Ajax returning. - With Gordon's body?
- Rocket Ajax returning. - With Gordon's body?
I presume so. Communications are off.
- Are they in the proper approach? - Negative.
- Open fire! - On Ajax?
- Open fire! - On Ajax?
- Open fire! - On Ajax?
All weapons, now! Charge the lightning field.
I take responsibility, in the Emperor's name.
I take responsibility, in the Emperor's name.
Attention, all wedding guests. There is no cause for alarm.
Attention, all wedding guests. There is no cause for alarm.
The weapons are being fired in continuous salute. -
- In honor of His Majesty's wedding.
- In honor of His Majesty's wedding.
Come on, Flash. It's time to bail out.
Sorry, I'm not coming. The rocket cycle's gone.
- I'll carry you. - Bail out, Vultan.
- I'll carry you. - Bail out, Vultan.
- Are you crazy? - The fire's too heavy.
We'll never make it with nobody at the wheel.
- It's suicide, Flash! - No. A rational transaction.
- It's suicide, Flash! - No. A rational transaction.
- One life for billions. - You'll be destroyed!
- One life for billions. - You'll be destroyed!
Looney bird! Get out of here, they need you.
Looney bird! Get out of here, they need you.
- Goodbye, Flash, it's been... - I know. For me too, Vultan.
- Goodbye, Flash, it's been... - I know. For me too, Vultan.
Tell Dale I know it would've been good.
You must come from one hell of a planet.
Not too bad.
Not too bad.
Not too bad.
Onward, my brave Hawkmen.
Let this be known forever as Flash Gordon's Day!
